TopicTitle: Cant see crafts when opening the UI

Articles.Content: I recently added this mod to my install. The game loaded up just fine but when I open the UI by clicking on the Orbital Mount, I can't see any craft to construct. I can view the resource management and can see crafts that are in the VAB/SPH but I am unable to load them or select them to build. Any help is most welcome.
Welcome to the forum @Darth Cobb, your issue has been moved to KSP 1 Tech support, modded. Which mod are you having trouble with?
The mod is Extraplanetary Launchpads. Apologies, I thought the post was linked to the mod page.
